Anggy Umbara Ubah Citra Si Manis Jembatan Ancol
01 Nov 2019, 00:53 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Citra Si Manis Jembatan Ancol pada tahun 1990-an, menjadi sosok yang kerap tampil vulgar dengan baju-baju yang terbuka. Namun saat ini, sutradara Anggy Umbara ingin mengubah sosok Si Manis kembali ke cerita awalnya pada tahun 1973.
"Sebenarnya ini salah satu misi saya, membuat Si Manis seperti ini. Dulu kan identik dengan baju seksi, saya ingin hapus itu, mengingat aslinya tidak seperti itu," ujar Anggy dalam konfrensi pers Film Si Manis Jembatan Ancol di Epicentrum XXI, Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
Anggy menjelaskan, film horor dengan embel-embel artis yang hanya menjual sensualitas sudah tidak relevan. Menurutnya, dengan tidak adanya kesensualan dari hantu di film tersebut, tidak akan mengubah jalan cerita dan hasil film.
Menurut Anggy sinetron Si Manis Jembatan Ancol yang populer pada tahun 90-an, tidak sesuai dengan cerita film aslinya pada tahun 1973. Si Manis 90-an, kata Anggy, telah merusak citra dari tokoh utama di film tersebut.
Dengan ia membuat kembali film Si Manis Jembatan Ancol ini, ia ingin menjawab kegelisahan masyarkat soal sosok Si Manis yang melenceng. "Saya menjawab kegelisahan masyarakat Betawi, kami kembalikan ke root awal di tahun 1972," ujar Anggy.
Di filmnya yang terbaru ini, Anggy menghadirkan sosok Si Manis dengan kerudung dan gaun panjang berwarna merah. Ia pun mengubah set lokasi menjadi tahun 70-an, agar menghidupkan kisah Si Manis kembali.
Si Manis diperankan oleh Indah Permatasari, sebelumnya ia agak ragu dengan tawaran film ini dikarenakan citra Si Manis yang begitu sensual pada tahun 90-an. Anggy pun menjelaskan tidak akan membuat Si Manis dengan karakternya seperti di sinetron.
Film Si Manis Jembatan Ancol akan tayang pada 26 Desember 2019, kali ini Anggy mengeluarkan trailernya yang ternyata sedikit bermasalah di penentuan umur penonton. Dengan adanya beberapa adegan penih dengan darah Lembaga Sensor Film memintanya untuk dipotong hingga 2 menit.

Anggy Umbara Changes the Image of the Sweet Ancol Bridge
01 Nov 2019, 00:53 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Image of the Sweet Si Ancol Bridge in the 1990s, has become a figure who often appears vulgar with exposed clothes. But this time, director Anggy Umbara wants to change the figure of the Sweet Back to the original story in 1973.
"Actually, this is one of my missions, to make Sweet like this. Before it was identical with sexy clothes, I want to erase it, considering that the originals are not like that," Anggy said in a press conference of the Sweet Ancol Bridge Film at Epicentrum XXI, Thursday, 31 October 2019.
Anggy explained, horror films with frill artists who only sell sensuality are no longer relevant. According to him, the absence of sensuality from ghosts in the film, will not change the storyline and the results of the film.
According to Anggy, the Si Manis Jembatan Ancol soap opera that was popular in the 90s, did not match the original film story in 1973. The Sweet 90s, Anggy said, had damaged the image of the main character in the film.
With his remake of the Sweet Ancol Bridge film, he wants to answer the community's anxiety about the deviant figure of the cutie. "I answered the anxiety of the Betawi people, we returned to root early in 1972," Anggy said.
In this latest film, Anggy presents the figure of the Sweet with a veil and a long red dress. He also changed the location set to the 70s, so that the story of the Sweet Si was revived.
The Sweet is played by Indah Permatasari, before she was a little hesitant about the offer of this film because the image of the Sweet is so sensual in the 90s. Anggy also explained it would not make the Sweet with the character like in soap operas.
Si Manis Jembatan Ancol will be aired on December 26, 2019, this time Anggy released his trailer which turned out to be a bit of a problem in determining the age of the audience. With some bloody scenes, the Film Sensor Institute asked him to cut it for up to 2 minutes.
